Koga Shuko/Anubis/Hades:



Koga Shuko looks to Set.  "Welcome back.  We will be making a full scale 
assault on the Ark.  I've detected multiple Maximals leaving the ship to 
fight Predacons.  It's a perfect oppertunity to finish them."

---

Anubis and Hades both load their weapons and head for a hatch to wait until 
the order is given to fight.
